trends: There have been no other sightings in Macau
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: I have seen this sort of flying object landing close to me
divs: Sighting DetailsI was gettin out of a casino in Macao and I've seen this rounded thing flying over me landing pretty close to the place I was. I thought it was something weird but at the same time it could have been just cause I was tired. Anyway I was too scared to investigate a bit more so I left, but I will never forget the sensation I fell.
